statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customer_behavior WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, transaction_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE product_category LIKE '%Clothing%' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, product_category FROM customer_behavior WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_behavior WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' AND transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, product_name FROM customer_behavior WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND product_category = 'Shoes' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM customer_behavior WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY product_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, phone FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions >= 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food';
SELECT customer_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food' AND preference_value = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT customer_name, preference_category, preference_value FROM customers INNER JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '96a4e7dc-9db6-4fb5-8b58-78a5aaf71235';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.category = 'Clothing' AND p.quantity >= 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, customer_id, date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 54321 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 67890;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 98765;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
